product_name: ExOfficio Rozeta Pull-Thru Scarf - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The ExOfficio Rozeta Pull-Thru Scarf keeps you cozy and fashionable anywhere your travels take you. The wool blend features a fun cable knit on one side and a soft contrast color lining on the other.
short_description: The ExOfficio Rozeta Pull-Thru Scarf keeps you cozy and fashionable anywhere your travels take you. The wool blend features a fun cable knit on one side and a soft contrast color lining on the other.
